abstract: Sweden’s Electrolux said on Monday it has agreed to buy Egypt’s Olympic Group, the biggest appliance maker in the Middle East and North Africa, cementing their long-standing partnership.
snippet: Sweden’s Electrolux said on Monday it has agreed to buy Egypt’s Olympic Group, the biggest appliance maker in the Middle East and North Africa, cementing their long-standing partnership.
lead_paragraph: Electrolux of Sweden said on Monday it had agreed to buy Egypt’s Olympic Group, the biggest appliance maker in the Middle East and North Africa, cementing their long-standing partnership.

headline.main: Electrolux to Buy Stake in Egypt’s Olympic Group
